mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.user_id as t_user_id, t.desc as t_desc, t.type as t_type, t.code as t_code, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.ip as t_ip, t.method as t_method
mapper.insert: insert into sys_log (id, user_id, desc, type, code, create_time, ip, method) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_log
id,
user_id,
desc,
type,
code,
create_time,
ip,
method,

mapper.update:
update sys_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
